column4: time to start work. He walked out and wander halls. Tried to kick staff. Support called. attempted to leave building. Bang his head on door. Escorted to timeout to calm.

column3: Started to play with toy and put it in another students face and annoyed him. Multiple attempts made and he did not listen. Attempted to leave building. Kicking staff
column4: started to bang his head. Support called

column3: X was asked to go to first station
column4: needed multiple prompts. He refused to move and began to tip chairs and hit/kick staff. Support called
column5: escorted to timeout. small child used as he began to hit his head.

column3: X At the end of the day was asked to complete work. He refused and put his head down. After 2 minutes staff prompted him that in order to get ECT he needed to complete work. He hit and kicked staff

Student crawled under table after PE. He began to tip chairs and shake table. He was told to stay safe then climbed out and tried to throw other objects. In hallway tried to leave building. Support called

Student started to do math work then decided to stop. He threw material and crawled under table and began to kick and tip chairs. He started to kick and hit when told to be safe. He ran out of building so escorted to timeout until calm.

X Informed he needed to stop at nurse. He got upset and tried to run out of the building. Support was called and began to kick and hit staff. Escorted to timeout. Once calm he sat there the rest of the day.

column4: refused to read a book. Sat with his head down. He then started to kick staff and wander halls. Support followed he became aggressive. Support called escorted to timeout. Banging his head in timeout. Restraint used to keep him safe.
